title: Enhancing Hospitality Practice Competencies: Genetic Diversity Exploration Education Based on Virtual Laboratories

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational life sciences theory, basic molecular biology concepts, and general understanding of environmental policies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Quantitatively analyze genetic differences between individuals by applying the principles of DNA electrophoresis
Explain the impact of genetic diversity on environmental adaptation and evolutionary change using virtual laboratory tools
Logically present case-based linkages of genetic diversity across molecular, individual, population, and ecosystem levels
Interpret genetic diversity data to derive scientific evidence for environmental policy decision-making
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
